directions: Place beans in large pot. Add enough water to cover beans by 3 inches. Soak beans overnight.

Drain beans and return to same pot. Add enough water to pot to cover beans by 4 inches. Mix in remaining ingredients. Simmer over medium heat until beans are tender and creamy, stirring occasionally, about 1 1/2 hours. Season with salt and serve.
title: Zesty Pinto Beans
